name: Maintenance Mode
description:
Centuries in the future, a maintenance drone conducts its daily routine.

This ultra-short game was created in Bitsy for the silent bitsy jam, and developed from February 25-28, 2020.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys, WASD, swipe, analog sticks (either side) or D-pad to move and interact with objects;

Press Enter, tap, or press a gamepad face button (any) to page through dialog.

CONTENT WARNING:

Depictions of violence.

DISCLAIMER:

This game contains sound effects and an ambient track which may not play as intended in your browser depending on its autoplay settings.

Special thanks to the programmers of the bitsy-hacks catalog, and to hideous cave goblin's bitsy room converter for enabling the graphics.
